Text:
It mignt be off-topic but would you please upload these two Pierre Richard comedies if you have them?
Le grand blond avec une chaussure noire
Les malheurs d'Alfred
Thanks in advance.

sounds yummy
and familiar
probably saw this in the 70's
either on TV or the Jewelbox Theater in Seattle

thanks, your oddness
griez, you might enjoy "Nuit de chien", and if you missed it, "26 bathrooms", and if you're still into Vonnegut, "Knoflikari" if you didn't pick it up elsewhere.
oh, and there is a forum here.
Thank you, sunshot100, I ordered it about a month ago, but it still hasn't shipped.  There is some confusion whether it will have English subs.

Lured - thank you!  http://www.kino.com/press/glamourgirls/lured_2.jpg Lucille Ball did some interesting films other than comedy, my favourite (and hers) being The Big Street.  She and Henry Fonda were fabulous and Agnes Moorehead in a supporting role was unrecognizable as we are so used to seeing her as Endora on Bewitched.  Check her out also as a Goldwyn Girl in Roman Scandals!
